lines.text: Since I retired, I resigned myself to a life of solitude.
For two years I started my day watching Supermarket Sweep. Days then blurred into one long sorry afternoon chat show.
he's back in the Media Dimension, and they think I'm crazy enough to go back in after him.
So they whisk me away to interrogation 101. They play rough, start giving me the business. I give a little back!
[farts]
So we negotiate a little something to cover my expenses. They throw in one of those secret agent suits and I tell them we've got a deal.
Looks like I'm heading back into the Media Dimension. It's going to be déja ouch all over again!
A little tongue now, a lot of tail later.
Oh, no, I'm too young to have a second childhood!
I'll beat this level, but in an hour, I'll be hungry for another.
Would Cheech and/or Chong report to the front desk?
Don't take career advice from Joe Piscopope!
Hey, I feel like I'm trapped in Boy George's pants!
Gex, I am your father.
Yeah, I can see the resemblance.
Lickin' my way to the top!
Slip of the tongue,hmm hmm!
It's tail time!
Is this the year of the gecko?
My tail's gonna kick your butt!
Reminds me of Halloween at Rip Taylor's!
There's a gecko on my tail! R2, see what you can do with it.
DADDY NEEDS AIR! DADDY NEEDS AIR!
Goodness gracious! Great balls of fire!
Wham, bam, thank you electronic man!
The difference between here and Hades is that theres' no Kathy Lee Gifford...
I'll take Ways I can Burn To Death for $100, Alex.
All this technology and Shatner still can't get a good hairpiece...
So... this is where they decided to change Coke!
Welcome to the only thing more evil than IRS headquarters.
At least I'm not at the DMV!

[in an Austin Powers-ish accent]
Judo chop,baby,yeah!
Add one million years, two white tigers, and we're at Siegfried and Roy!
Is that a light sabre, or are you just happy to see me?
Float like a butterfly, sting like a gecko!

[sounding oddly strained]
Note to self... don't drink tap water at Jerry Garcia's.
Looks like Bugs Bunny after the trots!
Tell me again the difference between the future and Las Vegas.
This place is bigger than Drew Carey's bar tab!

[sung]
The hills are alive with a purple fungus...
Man, Tokyo has some BAD parking!

[as in a movie trailer]
In a land before time... before Saturday Night Live was funny...

[From a Monty Python movie]
Bring out yer dead!

[worriedly]
I'm havin' 'Nam flashbacks and I wasn't even there!
I hate these low-budget "B" levels...
Looks like somebody ran over Barney!
Look, I just wanted the gift shop and the bathroom.
My name is Kang. I seek water.
It beats the Matterhorn. What are you gonna do?
Has anyone seen Fox Mulder's sister?
This is Major Gex to ground control...
Keep the tribbles... I just want the quadrotriticale!
Boys! Tron didn't work once... it's not gonna work twice!
Akira, to white courtesy phone... Akira, to white cortesy phone.
Ahhh... Detroit! Pearl of the Orient!
Never trust the robot
This is for all the angels in heaven.
My God! This is New York! I LIVED here, worked here...
Pardon my tongue, darling.
Aw, I should have just been a Maytag repairman!

[mockingly]
Marshall, Will, and Holly, on a routine expedition...

[in the Rezopolis stage]
The horror.

[as Captain Kirk]
Alright,boys. Phasers on stun.

[as an old lady]
Oh,I'll give you such a pinch!

[burning]
Indigestion!

[when burning]
Pepto-Bismol...

[when tailwhipping something]
There's *plenty* more where that came from.
They call him Flipper, Flipper...
I know what you're thinking... it's tail time.
Ugly is as ugly does...
All this, thanks to Miracle-Gro.
Red rum! Red rum!
Wham, bam, thank you, electronic man!
Welcome to Jurassic Park... Keep your eyes open for Sleestaks and bad special effects.
Damn IRS!
Evolve, or get outta my way, pal!
And the difference between a Sleestak and you is...?

[sung]
Hey baby, it's the 4th of July-y!
If you're St. Peter, them I'm... NOOOOO!
Another morning at Timothy Leary's house.
Shark!
My inner child is coming out, and it *hurts*!

[in a Southern accent]
Looks like we got us a fly in the spider's web.

[as Jimi Hendrix]
'Scuse me, while I tailwhip this guy!
Jimmy Hoffa, white courtesy phone... Jimmy Hoffa.
It's not the heat, it's the LAVA!
Ravashing!
Hoo-hah!
Evening, Mr. Picasso!
